description:
Independent Study Modules (ISMs) are for students with the requisite background to work closely with an instructor on a well-defined project in the respective specialization areas. Students will be exposed to individual-based
research and report-writing while tackling a business issue under the guidance of the instructor.
title: Independent Study in Ops & Supply Chain Mgt
prerequisite: Vary according to project topic. In general, however, students will have to have completed the core modules of the BBA/BBA(Acc) curriculum.
